system.sustained: The Weirdboy accelerates themselves or a vehicle they happen to be riding in, even if it's a voidship. If made to accelerate themselves on foot, Weirdboy can immediately make the Run or Charge Action as a free action, increasing this move by 2 metres per Degree of Success on Focus Power Test. If made to accelerate a vehicle or voidship they are in, it grants any character on board a bonus of +5xPsy Rating (max +30) to the next Test to increase that vehicle or voidship's speed.
